description: Generate and answer based on the provided sources

parameters.name: ask
parameters.description: User question(i.e., How do I execute task A?)

parameters.name: sources
parameters.description: Sources retrieved to answer the user question (i.e., file1.pdf: To execute task A you need to access system B. file2.pdf: System B is used when users need to execute task A.)

parameters.name: bot_description
parameters.description: Describe what the bot is and do.
